Additional Cilia.Description: Additional Cilia improve the cell's maximum speed

Cell Wall.Description: A thicker cell wall means this cell can take more damage

Longer Telomeres.Description: Adapt this cell to a longer lifespan

Mitosis Cost.Description: Additional centrosomes make it easier for this cell to reproduce

Surface Antigens.Description: Improved surface antigens cause more contact damage to other cells

Flagella Strength.Description: Stronger flagella deal additional damage at a distance

Efficient Metabolism.Description: Aerobic Respiration means every sugar molecule goes further
